sentence.Network_en: Dark comedy refers rather to the tragicomic form in which laughter and despair are inextricably mingled.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑色喜剧一词更确切地说是把笑声和绝望难解难分地结合在一起的那种悲喜剧形式.

sentence.Network_en: For years my love life continued to be one long tragicomic novel.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年来,我的爱情就像一本长长的悲喜交集的小说.

entry.def: Something that is tragi-comic is both sad and amusing at the same time.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of tragicomedy;
2. manifesting both tragic and comic aspects;

sentences.sentence: "the tragicomic disparity...between's man's aspirations and his accomplishments"- B.R.Redman

means.word_mean: 3. having pathetic as well as ludicrous characteristics;

sentences.sentence: "her life...presented itself to me as a tragicomical adventure"--Joseph Conrad
